text: Nokuba Uza kubohlwaya abahanahanisi nabahanahanisikazi, abakhonzi bezithixo nabakhonzazana bezithixo, nabo bacinga iingcinga ezingcolileyo ngoAllâh. Phezu kwabo kukho ishwangusha eliluhlobo olungcolileyo kwaye uAllâh Unomsindo ngokubhekisele kubo, Wabaqalekisa nokubaqalekisa, Wabalungiselela isiHogo, Hayi ukungcola kwesiphelo sohambo lwabo
